title: Enforcer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Empose a curfew on the town, causing all inquisition members to roleblock their targets(3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -While this role is alive, all inquisition members are Roleblock immune.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid the town of heretics and nonbelievers

desc:
Post 3264
*You are a police officer who imposes curfews on the town.*
